trans-unit.source: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en sammensetning relatert til text-inndataene som inneholder teksten sammensetningen seg selv, noen relaterte kontrollen eller systemet tekst, og et tilstand fullført for sammensetningen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, and composition text as initial values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> klasse, tar et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>, kildeelementet og sammensetning tekst som opprinnelige verdier for den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used to create a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>, the new instance will have <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> set to **On**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne konstruktøren brukes til å opprette en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>, må den nye forekomsten <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A>satt til **på**.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>

trans-unit.source: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Et inndata manager å knytte til denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A source element for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Kildeelement for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Objektet underliggende kildeelementet må implementere den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the initial text for the composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder den første teksten for sammensetningen.

trans-unit.source: This parameter will become the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*> property in the new class instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren blir verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>egenskap i den nye klasseforekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, composition text, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> setting as initial values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> klasse, tar et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>, kildeelementet, sammensetning tekst, og en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"> </xref> innstilling som opprinnelige verdier for den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Et inndata manager å knytte til denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A source element for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Kildeelement for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Objektet underliggende kildeelementet må implementere den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the initial text for the composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder den første teksten for sammensetningen.

trans-unit.source: This parameter will become the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*> property in the new class instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren blir verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>egenskap i den nye klasseforekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying desired auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"> </xref> opplistinger angir ønsket automatisk virkemåten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the auto-complete setting for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter innstillingen automatisk fullføre for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying the current auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"> </xref> opplistinger angir den gjeldende automatisk virkemåten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Completes this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the static <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A> method with this text composition as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller statiske <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A>metode med denne tekstjustering som inndataparameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sammensetningen teksten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder teksten sammensetningen for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets any control text associated with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten en kontroll som er forbundet med denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder teksten en kontroll som er forbundet med denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the system composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir system sammensetningen teksten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the system composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder system sammensetningen teksten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the system text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten system for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the system text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder teksten system for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den gjeldende teksten for denne tekstjustering.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the current text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder gjeldende teksten for denne tekstjustering.
